text: Robert "Bobby" Lee, Jr. (born September 17, 1971) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, singer, dancer, voice artist, and comedian, best known for his work on MADtv. He was born in San Diego, California.Bobby Lee's biography on MADtv's official website ==Notes and References== ==Other websites== * * Official MADtv Website Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from San Diego Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from San Diego Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Bobby Lee
